data.name: Password Strength
data.description:
Return the strength of a given password.
For each of the following criteria a password meets, it gains 1 point. - is at least 11 characters long - contains at least 1 special (non-alphanumeric) character - contains at least 2 numeric characters - contains both upper and lower case letters Strength key: 0pt = "unacceptable", 1pt = "weak", 2pt = "medium", 3pt = "strong", 4pt = "very strong".
Regardless of points gained, any password shorter than 8 characters must be deemed "unacceptable". e.g. The password "ptx4w6rE" would return "medium".
NB: This is just for fun and is not intended to reflect real-world password strength.
